remarks: Member of the domain of the least upper bound function of a poset. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
statement:
lubeldm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lubeldm.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lubeldm.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
lubeldm.p $e |- ( ps <-> ( A. y e. S y .<_ x /\ A. z e. B ( A. y e. S y .<_ z -> x .<_ z ) ) ) $.
lubeldm.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
lubeldm $p |- ( ph -> ( S e. dom U <-> ( S C_ B /\ E! x e. B ps ) ) ) $.
$d B x z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
